column5: Does anyone know if Nippissing is starting to freeze over?  Particularly around Jessops Island on the south shore?  Cheers!!
Yes it is...has been for about the past 5-days or so, not very long.  See www.torbay.net and look at the web cam 'live dock view'.
I checked our lake (west of Sudbury) last night - there was 4" where I drilled.  We're getting snow while the new ice is forming though - not good.
That thinkin would get you a big hefty fine....
